document_data.name: Quil'bryn
document_data.mainbody: '''Quil'bryn''' was a mad [[drow]] in [[Szith Morcane]] in the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].{{Cite adventurers league/Szith Morcane Unbound|14-15}}
document_data.History:
''Circa'' [[1486 DR]], Quil'bryn was a member of the [[Drow Resistance]] against the invading [[fire giant]]s. However, he was infected by a kind of hedonistic madness and murdered the archmage [[Solom Ned'razak]].

Afterward, Quil'bryn, despite the objections of [[Murssvayas Dhuurniv]], tried to convince all drow to abandon Szith Morcane.
document_data.Personality: In his madness, Quil'bryn wanted to live again in a great drow city, with many [[slave]]s at his disposal, focusing only on enjoying life.
